meanings.definition: A person who is experienced or knowledgeable in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the group project, Sarah was the maven of coding, helping everyone understand the programming language.
meanings.sent2: The gardening maven shared tips on growing tomatoes with the beginners in the community.
meanings.sent3: The cooking maven tried to teach her cat how to make pancakes, but it just made a mess.
meanings.sent4: She was a maven of fashion, always putting together outfits that turned heads wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The maven of woodworking could turn a simple block of wood into a beautiful piece of art.

meanings.definition: A person who seeks to pass on knowledge or expertise to others.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa was the family maven, always eager to share his stories and wisdom with the grandchildren.
meanings.sent2: The tech maven organized workshops to teach seniors how to use smartphones and social media.
meanings.sent3: The baking maven tried to teach her dog how to make cookies, but ended up with a kitchen covered in flour.
meanings.sent4: She became a maven of photography, capturing moments that spoke volumes without saying a word.
meanings.sent5: The maven of storytelling could weave tales that transported listeners to magical realms.
